title: Hi Res Monitor Makes Cursor Microscopic
body: Does anyone know how to fix this? I'm playing only custom and co-op because my performance is crap when i have to guess where my cursor is

replies.body:
Hey there,

* What is your native resolution?
* What resolution do you have the game running at?

League in its current state doesn't cope well with many resolutions higher than 1920x1080.
